definition: to belong to/to be affiliated to/to fall under the jurisdiction of/a place where one feels that one belongs/one's final destination (where one need look no further)
surname Gui

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on
sense of belonging
right of attribution

sentences.english: From that day on, the Klatooinians were property of the Hutt criminal empire.
sentences.chinese: 从那以后，克拉图因人便归属于赫特人的犯罪帝国。

sentences.english: You can accomplish much if you do not care who gels the credit.
sentences.chinese: 一个人假如不计较功劳归属于谁，他的成就就会更大。

sentences.english: Friendships provide a sense of belonging and comfort.
sentences.chinese: 友谊提供了归属感和舒适感。

sentences.english: We all want to belong, no matter what our age.
sentences.chinese: 无论我们年龄有多大，我们需要归属感。

sentences.english: Can Americans choose how and when to use ethnic heritage in describing themselves?
sentences.chinese: 美国人能够选择怎样及何时使用族裔归属自我定位吗？

sentences.english: The ownership of the island has long been established beyond dispute.
sentences.chinese: 该岛的归属早已确定无疑。

sentences.english: The explanation rights of the above details belongs to our company and the cruise company.
sentences.chinese: 以上细则的解释权归属我公司及游船公司。

sentences.english: One can query the phone number attribution process, support for the latest segment number.
sentences.chinese: 一个可以查询手机号码归属地的程序，支持最新号段。

sentences.english: Payables that cannot be classified as accounts payable.
sentences.chinese: 指不能归属于应付帐款之款项。

sentences.english: In conclusion, friendships provide a sense of belonging and comfort.
sentences.chinese: 最后，友谊提供了归属感和舒适感。

sentences.english: The genetic series of these granitic rocks may belong to that of mixed crust-mantle derivation.
sentences.chinese: 它们的成因系列应归属于壳幔混源型。

sentences.english: The last chapter evaluates the historical significance as well as the categorization of Shen Zi's theories.
sentences.chinese: 第六章即最后一章述评慎子的学派归属及历史地位。

sentences.english: They used to be floating in the air and at last found their own sense of belongingness .
sentences.chinese: 他们从漂浮于空中到最终寻找到自己的一种归属感。

sentences.english: The distinction of identity and the ascription of liability is the basis of all legal relationship.
sentences.chinese: 身分辨识及责任归属是一切法律关系的基础。

sentences.english: The Egyptians strove against with the Romans for the possession of the Nile Valley .
sentences.chinese: 埃及人为争取尼罗河谷的归属曾和罗马人进行斗争。

sentences.english: In China, nothing quite kills the romance like the threat of losing real estate.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，扼杀浪漫的罪魁祸首当属房产归属权。

control (as in "to win control")

each/respective/apiece

proprietor/owner

to seize/to capture/to wrest control of

"Red Poppies", novel by 阿來|阿来[A1 lai2]
lit. the dust has settled (idiom)/fig. to get sorted out/to be finalized
